title: Fasting Person Food Present
description: Authentic supplications for Fasting Person Food Present
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Fasting Person Food Present. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 185
items.arabic: ((إِذَا دُعِيَ أَحَدُكُمْ فَلْيُجِبْ، فَإِنْ كَانَ صَائِماً فَلْيُصَلِّ، وَإِنْ كَانَ مُفْطِراً فَلْيَطْعَمْ)) ، وَمَعْنَى فَلْيُصَلِّ أَيْ فَلْيَدْعُ.
